mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, content, contact_phone, contact_email, status, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_message_feedback (user_id, title, content, contact_phone, contact_email, status, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{status}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_message_feedback WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.title, f.content, f.status, f.create_time, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_message_feedback_comment c WHERE c.feedback_id = f.id AND c.is_deleted = 0 ) AS comment_count FROM t_message_feedback f WHERE f.id = #{id} AND f.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.title, f.content, f.status, f.create_time, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_message_feedback_comment c WHERE c.feedback_id = f.id AND c.is_deleted = 0 ) AS comment_count FROM t_message_feedback f WHERE f.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY f.create_time DESC

SELECT f.id, f.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.nickname AS user_nickname, f.title, f.content, f.contact_phone, f.contact_email, f.status, f.create_time, f.update_time FROM t_message_feedback f LEFT JOIN t_user u ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE f.is_deleted = 0
AND f.status = #{status}
AND ( f.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR f.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY f.create_time DESC

SELECT f.id, f.user_id, u.username AS user_name, u.nickname AS user_nickname, f.title, f.content, f.contact_phone, f.contact_email, f.status, f.create_time, f.update_time FROM t_message_feedback f LEFT JOIN t_user u ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE f.id = #{id} AND f.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
